name: topk_d128_k8
description: Top-k selection with k=8 from dimension 128. Used for sparse attention or expert routing.
reference:
import torch

@torch.no_grad()
def run(input):
    batch_size, dim = input.shape
    k = 8
    
    # Check constants
    assert dim == 128
    
    values, indices = torch.topk(input, k, dim=-1)
    return values, indices
